title: Ex-Google Engineer Convicted for Stealing 2,000 AI Trade Secrets for China Startup
description: A former Google engineer accused of stealing thousands of the company's confidential documents to build a startup in China has been convicted in the U.S., the Department of Justice (DoJ) announced Thursday.
